channel.title: Help needed
channel.description:
hey everyone, initially posted in the wrong place, apologies. Anyhow I had a few questions. I am by far a newbie to mopar, but have managed to get so far. Downloaded just a test server, which works ok, but am unable to save data from the game on it or any other I have tried. Possibly in the script??Anyhow any help would be appreciated. Also wondering what would be the most complete server, in terrms of creatures, skills etc that people are using. Thanks
Sparky

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

I’ve already answered it f 2 p 2 p f, second post.

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

If you like to code, yes it is fun, it may even be a good learning purpose, which is what I have used my experiences for, but being new, it is best to get a better server, with things loding correctly, correctly set out, and so on, to learn off. If you learn off a crappy source like Testscape, no offence to Nvi ible(Or however it’s spelled), you’re coding will be crap.

Do you understand now?

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

You don’t get it do you? Private servers are for fun, why pay when you can make your own even though it wouldn’t be the best server ever, you have still used alot of your time/effort to edit it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

You sir, just proved my point.

There are actually no released servers that has what he wants. Which is most skills and all the NPCs in correct placings. I’d say 99% of the servers on this site are jam packed with some random npcs, stupid shops, and commands.

As for:

…when you can make your own? Just google Java tutorials and read some of them, then start doing your own tutorials, if something goes wrong ask other people what you should do better.

This guy is obviously new. He doesn’t know how to code as “1337” as you think you can. If he wanted to learn how to code private servers, the Java tutorials would do nothing for him. Private server coding is 10 times easier than real Java, if he went and read real Java tutorials he would get lost, which I’m guessing you would too.

NEVER EVER BUY A SERVER

Why not? If a server is good enough to sell, then it is good enough for someone wanting to pay for it.

~ Budda

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:2, topic:95749”]If it’s a test server, why does it matter if it saves the characters? If you mean saving the coding, then save the file and run your compiler.

As for the best server, there is none. People here will say “TESTSCAPE!!111!@@!!”, trust me it sucks. They may even say something about Pimpscape, or something of the like. But they do all suck. Your best bet for getting a really well-coded, advanced server is to buy someones. As there is no buying on this site, I would like to add that this site sucks. I suggest googling another site, you will find a couple.
This place is too full of complete idiots. You seem nice enough, smart enough, so I am saying this to help you in the future. If you want to get good at this, be well known, have a good server, then quit this site all together, go join another one.

~ Budda[/quote]Budda fuck off, who would want to buy a server when you can make your own? Just google Java tutorials and read some of them, then start doing your own tutorials, if something goes wrong ask other people what you should do better. NEVER EVER BUY A SERVER. Budda is so wrong about Test and Pimpscape, they’re all good.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

If it’s a test server, why does it matter if it saves the characters? If you mean saving the coding, then save the file and run your compiler.

As for the best server, there is none. People here will say “TESTSCAPE!!111!@@!!”, trust me it sucks. They may even say something about Pimpscape, or something of the like. But they do all suck. Your best bet for getting a really well-coded, advanced server is to buy someones. As there is no buying on this site, I would like to add that this site sucks. I suggest googling another site, you will find a couple.
This place is too full of complete idiots. You seem nice enough, smart enough, so I am saying this to help you in the future. If you want to get good at this, be well known, have a good server, then quit this site all together, go join another one.

~ Budda

Read full topic
